about_the_game:
Dive into an adventure in the earth’s oceans in your high-tech submarine fascinating spots like the Galapagos, the Arctic, Cozumel, the Deep Sea or a WW2 shipwreck. Solve quests in each level using your upgradeable tools like the laser to cut free jailed whales, the scanner to get info for over 100 species, the welder to repair broken subsea pipes and the beam grabber to collect wreck pieces or corals. Swim with majestic whales, sharks and sea turtles.

And take action: you can support the work of real NGOs.

And big fish are swimming with you. In December 2024 Demi Lovato went diving with you. In 2024 Baywatch star David Hasselhoff and musician Joe Jonas were on your side. The proceeds from this offer support PlanetPlay Green Projects.

We partner also with the WDC - the Whale and Dolphin Conservation, the leading charity dedicated to the protection of whales and dolphins, and support their work.

Every time you re-visit one of the levels there will be new things to explore like new quests or new fish species. Just like the ocean our levels show the constant change.

The level missions are based around real sunken submarines, battleship wrecks and planes, Deep Sea creatures or Caribbean coral reefs. You will also encounter the giants and living wonders of the oceans from sharks, to dolphins, sea turtles and of course the blue whale and learn more about this unique, beautiful and threatened world.

With your mission success you contribute to protect and save the oceans. Many hours of gameplay with a personal story, great interaction and challenging quests with a leaderboard engage players on the exploration of the oceans and to go where no one has gone before.

You have a badge system with all tools upgradeable, a new Quest type: cut nets to free whales, a walkable ship with a holographic table, higher replayability of levels with changing oceans, a 'Maximal Comfort' setting against Nausea in VR.

We made a nice tutorial level so that you get comfortable how to move around and use the tools of the ROV best.

First Levels in Early Access: Galapagos, Cozumel, Arctic Ocean, WW2 shipwreck German Battlecruiser Scharnhorst

Next Levels: California and others more exciting content is coming thanks to our successful Earth Day crowdfunding campaign.
